content: उद्धरणं {@--1@} Drawing or taking out, taking off (clothes &c.). {@--2@} Extraction, pulling or tearing out; कंटक° <ls>Ms. 9. 252</ls>; चक्षुषोरुद्धरणं <ls>Mit.</ls>; so शल्य° {@--3@} Extricating, deliverance, rescuing (from danger); दीनोद्धरणोचितस्य <ls>R. 2. 25</ls>; स बंधुर्यो विपन्नानामापदुद्धरणक्षमः <ls>H. 1. 3.</ls> {@--4@} Destruction, eradication, extermination, deposition, dethronement; चंद्रगुप्तस्योद्धरणात् <ls>Mu. 4.</ls> {@--5@} Lifting, raising. {@--6@} Taking a part or share. {@--7@} Taking from the Gārhapatya fire to supply the other sacred fires. {@--8@} Vomiting. {@--9@} Anything vomited. {@--10@} Final emancipation. {@--11@} Acquittance of debt.
